I_D TESTING:
-R COMMANDS
-RS1 = 2
-RS2 = 4
-WRITE 20 ON RS1
-WRITE 40 ON RS2 
-RD  = 1


0000000 00100 00010 000 00001 0110011 -- 4260019    -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000000000 || 11776 
0100000 00100 00010 000 00001 0110011 -- 1078001843 -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000100000 || 11808

TEST PASSED (I_DTEST_R.vwf)
